intro.p: 台大資工系副教授，台大資工 HSA 讀書會的發起人之一。
主要的研究著重於計算機架構、平行處理、異質運算、效能最佳化、資訊安全、嵌入式系統設計等。近年的研究領域也包括雲端運算技術、Big Data 等。
於台大資工所成立 Performance, Applications and Security Lab (PASLAB)。
台大資工系教授，台大資工 HSA 讀書會的發起人之一。
研究領域主要為虛擬化技術、編譯器最佳化、動態二進制優化、計算機架構等。

speakers.name: Medicine Yeh
speakers.intro: 台大資工所博士生，PASLAB 成員

intro.p: Received B.S.E.E. and M.EMBA degrees from the National Cheng Kung University, Taiwan, in 1986 and 2007 respectively. Enrolling phD in Computer Science and Information Engineering of National Taiwan University from 2008.

Worked in designing a machine translation system from 1988 to 1991. Co-designed a client-server OLTP middleware for banking system from 1991 to 1996. Founded a software house and developed Internet e-commerce system from 1996 to 2002. Led the R&D team of PROTON Inc., Taiwan, and conducted a series of novel video product from 2003 to 2009.
Research interests and areas of publication include embedded and mobile system design, performance optimization, system virtualization, and Cloud computing.

speakers.name: Clay Chang
speakers.intro: 台大資工所博士生，PASLAB 成員
